sourcesContent: import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { Ingredient } from 'src/app/shared/ingredient.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-shopping-edit', templateUrl: './shopping-edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./shopping-edit.component.css'] }) export class ShoppingEditComponent { @Output() ingredientsSelected = new EventEmitter<{nameInput,amountInput}>(); onAddIngredients(name: HTMLInputElement, amount: HTMLInputElement) { this.ingredientsSelected.emit({ nameInput: name.value, amountInput: amount.value }) } }
